name: Abyssal
effect:
• 20% chance for Abyssal (5.5×).
• 80% chance for +30% fish weight.
• 20% chance for -40% fish weight.
tips: Decent option for money income.

name: Blessed
effect:
• +5% increased chance for Shiny/Sparkling (1.85×).
• +5% Lure Speed.
• +5% Progress Speed.
tips: Useful when hunting for Shiny or Sparkling fishes.

name: Blood Reckoning
effect: Sacrifice health for a health-dependant chance for Sanguine (5×)
tips: Most useful on non-meta rods that have a guaranteed fish size increase passive ability such as Kings Rod.

name: Breezed
effect:
• +50% Luck.
• +20% Lure Speed.
• +10% Progress Speed.
(Outside of Windy).
+100% Luck.
• +40% Lure Speed.
• +20% Progress Speed.
(during Windy)
tips: Useful for Rods with low Luck.

name: Chaotic
effect:
• 15% chance per fish movement to stab for +6% progress.
• 8% chance for Chaotic (8×).
tips: Useful for Rods with low Resilience and Stabs for Progress, also great option for money income.

name: Chronos
effect: Every 2.5 seconds, there is a 50% chance to freeze a fish for 3 seconds.
tips: Useful on rods with an increase progress speed passive.

name: Clever
effect: ×2.25 XP from all catches.
tips: Useful on Rods such as Great Rod of Oscar for greater XP boost.

name: Controlled
effect: +0.15 Control.
tips: Useful for rods with low control. One of the four enchantments that makes Tryhard Rod usable.

name: Divine
effect:
• +50% Luck.
• +20% Resilience.
• +25% Lure Speed.
tips: The better option for rods with low luck stats.

name: Flashline
effect:
• 25% chance for +100% Progress Speed.
• 75% chance for +15% Progress Speed.
tips: Useful in replacement of Steady while catching fish with negative Progress Speed modifiers.

name: Ghastly
effect:
• 100% chance for Translucent (1.3×).
• 10% chance to catch a duplicate fish.
tips: Useful on rods like Lucid Rod to increase fish duplication.

name: Hasty
effect: +55% Lure Speed.
tips: The better option for higher lure speed, generally useful on almost all rods, some allowing for instant lure times.

name: Hunter
effect: Increases Disturbance by +2
tips: The better option for higher Disturbance, generally useful on almost all rods, with some allowing hunts to spawn more easily as Disturbance increases.

name: Insight
effect:
• ×1.5 XP from all catches.
• +30% Lure Speed.
• 30% chance for Purified(2.5×).
tips: Useful for increasing level as well as increasing lure speed.

name: Long
effect:
• +150 Line Distance.
• +35% Resilience.
• +15% Progress Speed.
tips: Useful for increasing line distance of some rods, while also increasing Resilience and Progress Speed.

name: Lucky
effect:
• +25% Luck.
• +15% Lure Speed.
• +50% chance for Mutation.
tips: Good for rods with low luck.

name: Momentum
effect:
Every perfect catch increases:
• Lure Speed by 2%.
• Resilience by 2%.
• Progress Speed by 2%.
Regular catch reduces this by 4% each.
Goes up to 40%.
tips: Useful on rods with a high control and resilience.

name: Mutated
effect: +90% Mutation chance.
tips: Only boosts chances for natural Mutations.

name: Noir
effect:
• 100% chance for Albino (1.2×) or Darkened (1.5×).
• +20% Fish Size.
tips: Decent for increasing money income, while also increasing fish size.

name: Quality
effect:
• +20% Luck.
• +10% Resilience.
• +20% Lure Speed.
• +5% Progress Speed.
tips: Useful on rods that have amazing base lure speed (No-Life Rod, Rod Of The Forgotten Fang, etc.)

name: Resilient
effect:
+35% Resilience
• +10% size boost.
tips: Useful for rods with low Resilience.

name: Scavenger
effect:
3× higher chance to catch:
• Enchant Relics.
• Nukes.
• Treasure Maps.
• Threads.
Additionally:
• 1.75× higher chance for Exalted Relics.
• 1.5× higher chance for Atomic Nukes.
tips: Useful on rods that increase the chance of one of these items.

name: Sea King
effect: +30% Fish Size.
tips: Can be useful on rods with a high mutation chance.

name: Scrapper
effect: 60% chance not to consume Bait.
tips: Useful when using baits with extremely limited quantity such as the Chocolate Fish, Kraken Tentacle, Aurora Bait, etc.

name: Steady
effect:
+20% Progress Speed.
• +0.05 Control.
tips: Useful for catching fish with negative Progress Speed modifiers.

name: Storming
effect:
• +50% Luck.
• +25% Lure Speed.
• 25% chance for Electric (2.1×).
(outside Rain).
+100% Luck.
• +50% Lure Speed.
• 50% chance for Electric (2.1×).
(during Rain)
tips: Useful for Rods with good overall Stats but lack of Luck, that need some sort of mutation for money.

name: Swift
effect:
• +30% Lure Speed.
• +10% Progress Speed.
tips: Useful for rods with low lure speed.

name: Unbreakable
effect:
• +10,000 Max Kg.
• +0.1 Control.
tips: Useful for rods with limited weight capacity and low control. One of the four enchantments that makes Tryhard Rod usable.

name: Wormhole
effect:
80% chance to catch Fish from a random location.
(excludes Megalodons, Krakens, Limited fish, or Special fish).
tips: Useful for completing the Bestiary.

name: Anomalous
effect: 20% chance to catch a duplicate fish with Anomalous (5.55×).
tips: Useful on rods like Lucid Rod to increase fish duplication.

name: Ferocious
effect: Increases Disturbance by +4
tips: The better option for higher Disturbance, generally useful on almost all rods, with some allowing hunts to spawn more easily as Disturbance increases.

name: Herculean
effect:
• +25,000 Max Kg.
• +0.2 Control.
• +10% Progress Speed.
tips: Useful for rods with limited weight capacity or low control. One of the four enchantments that makes Tryhard Rod usable.

name: Immortal
effect:
• +75% Luck.
• +30% Progress Speed.
tips: Great for boosting catch speed and luck of most rods.

name: Invincible
effect:
• +inf Max Kg.
• Allows fishing in the Roslit Volcano, Scoria Reach, & Brine Pool.
tips: Useful on rods with unique mutation passives. Required for Duskwire to be usable.

name: Mystical
effect:
• +25% Luck.
• +45% Resilience.
• +15% Lure Speed.
• +10% Progress Speed.
tips: Overall great stat improvement that suits many rods.

name: Piercing
effect:
• 30% chance per fish movement to stab for +6% progress.
• +15% Progress Speed.
tips: Useful on rods with decent stats and low resilience or control.

name: Quantum
effect:
+25% Resilience.
•25% chance for Subspace (6×).
tips: Good for money earning, pairs well with rods that have great base stats such as the No-Life Rod, Challenger Rod, Katana Rod, etc.

name: Sea Overlord
effect: +40% Fish Size.
tips: Useful for rods with an already good mutation passive such as the Dreambreaker, Fabulous Rod, etc.

name: Cryogenic
effect: 20% chance to fully freeze a lured fish in the first second.
tips: Stops movement-based stabs. Great on fishes with low Resilience such as the Scylla, Mosslurker, etc.

name: Glittered
effect: 3% increased chance for Shiny/Sparkling.
tips: Useful when hunting for Shiny or Sparkling fishes.

name: Overclocked
effect: +5% Forced Progress Speed on any fish.
tips: Bypasses fish that ignore progress speed boosts, making it great for boosting catch speed for Progress Lock fishes.

name: Sea Prince
effect: +15% Fish Size.
tips: Useful for money making with a consistent 15% value increase.

name: Tenacity
effect: +20% Progress Speed for every snapped reel (stacks to inf).
tips: Useful for catching any specific fish that is not Progress Locked. Benefits Rod Of The Forgotten Fang the most, also allows for a massive progress speed boost for Leviathan's Fang Rod while catching the Scylla.

name: Tryhard
effect:
• +30% Progress Speed.
• -0.1 Control.
tips: Useful for rods with already decent control (Polaris Serenade, Brick Rod, etc.). Causes the Duskwire to become unusable.

name: Vicious
effect:
• Increases Disturbance by +1.
• +10% Progress Speed.
tips: Useful for spawning hunts and increasing progress speed.

name: Wise
effect: ×1.2 XP from all catches.
tips: Useful for players who need more levels without sacrificing other enchants.

name: Rage
effect:
• 25% chance per fish movement to stab for +8% progress.
• -50% Luck.
• -20% Resilience
tips: Great for rods with high Luck that lack a passive stab ability.

name: Greed
effect:
• +50% Fish Size.
• -30% Lure Speed.
• -5% Progress Speed.
tips: Great for rods that have high Lure Speed and a Mutation passive.

name: Fractured
effect:
• +50% Progress Speed.
• -0.1 Control.
tips: Great for rods that have high Control but lack a Progress Speed increasing passive.

name: Putrid
effect:
• -10% Luck.
• 2% chance for Putrid (-0.5×)

name: Pharaohs Curse
effect: 25% chance for Sandy (1.2×)

name: Weak
effect: -10% Max KG

name: Wobbly
effect: -0.05 Control

name: Blessed Song
effect: +40% Progress Speed.
tips: Useful for catching fish with negative Progress Speed modifiers
obtainment: Guaranteed when enchanting a rod with Song of the Deep.

name: Restricted
effect:
• Blocks Shiny, Sparkling, and Mutations from applying.
• Prevents Enchanting
• Restricts fishing to specific locations.
tips: Son...
obtainment: Applied to Pinion's Aria while completing Mysterious Songstress quest and is removed upon completion.

name: Valentine's
effect:
• 45% Chance to give one of the following Mutations:
• Lovely (8×)
• Sweet (7×)
• Candy (2×)
• +10% Resilience.
• +30% Progress Speed.
obtainment: Guaranteed when enchanting with Valentine's Relic from Valentides (2026).

name: Cupid
effect:
• 10% Chance for Sweet (7×).
• +25% Lure Speed.
• +30% Progress Speed.
obtainment: Guaranteed when enchanting with Cupid Relic from Valentides (2026).

name: Santa
effect:
• 30% Chance to give one of the following Mutations:
• Santa (8.5×)
• Jingle Bell (8×)
• Merry (5×)
• Gingerbread (5×)
• Peppermint (5×)
• +30% Fish Size.
• +30% Progress Speed.
obtainment: Guaranteed when enchanting with Santa's Relic from Fischmas (2025).

name: Gingerbread
effect:
• 10% chance for Gingerbread (5×).
• +40% Fish Size.
• +10% Progress Speed.
tips: Useful for rods with already good mutation passive.
obtainment: Chance when enchanting with Festive Relic from Fischmas (2025).

name: Merry
effect:
• 10% chance for Merry (5×).
• +35% Progress Speed.
• 35% Lure Speed.
tips: Useful for catching fish with negative Progress Speed modifiers.
obtainment: Chance when enchanting with Festive Relic from Fischmas (2025).

name: Peppermint
effect:
• 10% chance for Peppermint (5×).
• 40% chance per fish movement to stab for +1% progress.
• +25% Luck.
tips: Useful for rods without a built-in stab mechanic.
obtainment: Chance when enchanting with Festive Relic from Fischmas (2025).

name: Frightful
effect:
• 10% chance for Frightful (6×).
• +50% Progress Speed.
• -20% Resilience.
tips: Useful for rods with a built-in stab mechanic.
obtainment: Guaranteed when enchanting with Frightful Relic from FischFright (2025).

name: Spooky
effect:
• 10% chance for Spooky (6×).
• +0.1 Control.
• 30% chance per fish movement to stab for +3% progress.
tips: Useful for rods without a built-in stab mechanic. One of the four enchantments that makes Tryhard Rod usable.
obtainment: Guaranteed when enchanting with Spooky Relic from FischFright (2025).

name: Eerie
effect:
• 10% chance for Eerie (6×).
• +10% Progress Speed.
• +10% Fish Size.
tips: Useful for rods without an innate mutation passive
obtainment: Guaranteed when enchanting with Eerie Relic from FischFright (2025).
